title: Indiscretions- Tales of Love, Lust and Betrayal
description: "Indiscretions" is a fast paced ride through the lives of the unfaithful and the one's who love them. Relationships are tested, hearts are broken, but revenge is sweet in these four short stories by Skyy – the author of the popular series, "Choices", "Consequences" and "Crossroads". You can feel the storm coming in your bones, but after the hurricane only the strong will be left standing? When love is involved is there really such a thing as no strings attached? What do you do when you catch your mate with a person you also crave? And a man learns that he can’t have it all, or can he? Take a seat and enjoy this steamy ride.
author: Skyy
